description: In her previous life, she abandoned Qian Dahu who was rugged looking on the outside and only knew how to hunt, and married Xie Zurong, a handsome and gentle-looking talent, but only six years after the marriage, she discovered that her husband was bent (gay) and was bullied and abused by her mother-in-law and aunt.
